tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Consider yourself fortunate if your dental issues bring you to Dr Shetty. He is a master of his craft, one of the most empathetic, ethical, self-assured and intelligent doctors I have been to. He truly  engages with patients without rushing anything and logically explains every bit of the procedure. He will always follow up with patients post procedure to check progress and is always a call away.

And above all, an uncanny ability to put all their anxieties to rest.

Dr Shetty, you aren't just a great doctor but equally great human being. Thank you and stay blessed.
reply_text: This coming from you means a lot to me.  Thank you.. thanks a million. That's very very reassuring.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Nothing can be more frustrating than a recurring tooth ache. I had basically come to him for a recurring toothache and for second opinion on Bone Grafting suggested by my previous dentist. But preliminary investigation by Dr. Jeevan suggested that so such procedure was required. The root cause was identified and explained well by Dr. Jeevan and the necessary treatment for the same was done and I really had a sigh of relief.  
I recently got another Root Canal treatment done from Dr. Jeevan last week.  Again this time, it was very professionally handled and even the minor issues I had was taken care of.  Let me tell you I had RCT done earlier, but none could beat the experience at ‚Äú32 Smile  Stones‚Äù.  Needless to mention that being a working professional, I was able to get the appointments as per my convenience. 
A very peculiar aspect of Dr. Jeevan is that he is a perfectionist. He and his team will ensure that he you are comfortable and he himself is convinced about the same.  With all the latest equipment‚Äôs and accessories in place, the ambience of his clinic, *** ********* and vast experience, be rest assured that you have ended up at the right place.  I would strongly recommend Dr. Jeevan for any dental issues you experience.

review: I never thought that I would say "it's a pleasure to go to the dentist...but it truly is "..Dr.Sherry is an excellent dentist..with my perfect bridges fixation I am going happily for my vacation..Thanks Doc.I can't think of anything that will enhance your services because you cover everything which takes for a perfect dental treatment.He is a great hygienist which makes the visit more nice....My smile looks perfect now and I am really thankful to him for making it possible..it was a time consuming process but his dedication n non-tiring attitude made my treatment easy..Before starting the treatment he explains what is being done n why, which makes it easier to understand what's going on in your mouth..Also,he kept me aware about what to eat n what to avoid ..His in-depth knowledge in his field is something to rely upon.His exprience n knowledge can be seen from his great work..The doctor's attitude relieves the patient from all the dental treatment fears...Dr. Shetty. .I feel satisfied n happy that I had my treatment done from you and I really look forward for any future dental treatment if any...You have a great team as well.Keep up the good work Doctor. ..All the very best.Your professionalism and competence is admirable..

review:
Visit to Dentist, Dr Jeevan Shetty: 
Extracted my wisdom tooth. The tooth looked quite normal, like any other teeth but it was very painful.
The left side of my head started aching very badly, the left temple side's blood vessel veins pulsating could not only be felt but also seen, it was so painful. I have preserved the extracted tooth. The rot in the tooth could be seen only after extraction. The rot is the result of my carelessness.
Not brushing my teeth before going to bed is the prise I had to pay.
I thank Dr. Jeevan Shetty for extracting my rotten tooth without damage to any other teeth, gums, cheeck or tongue.
At night I enjoyed my ice cream, cold milkshake with bananas and a good night sleep.
I am back to normal.
reply_text: Thank you for your response sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Shetty knows his work very well undoubtedly. He works very patiently, analyse the root cause of the problem and hit the bulls eye when the right time comes.  Irrespective of any number of sittings, if he is not satisfied with the improvement, he will not let you go. He provided me an optimal solution according to my budget. 
   As I am a researcher in the field of 3D printing (applicable here for implants), I found that he is very well aware with such latest technologies. His clinic is well equipped with all the relevant tools and accessories.  Without a doubt, I confidently recommend Dr. Shetty for being guardian of your "32 Smile Stones". 

PS; Dr. Shetty: When I will start my independent research in 3D printing. I hope to have the opportunity to work with you in real time case studies.
reply_text: Very generous and encouraging words there sajan. Thanks and i appreciate the gesture.

as far as my experience i strongly recomend DR. Jeeven Shetty for any Dental problem

review:
They say you gotta do what you love, rather than love what you do. Dr Shetty is a living example of it. 
he's been my dentist since I was a collage kid, he saved a pair of my tooth... twice.
I had a sever tooth decay case for which all dentists I visit advised to remove that and add a dental implant, I was 21 back than, not ready to loose a tooth, that's when I found Dr Shetty's clinic in powai and he was able to do root canal on same tooth that others out rightly said was a dead tooth. 
I recently got off another another root canal treatment with him like two weeks ago and this is what I honestly have to say,
Dr Shetty is one of the rare professional  who loves his job. once you decide to go with him, you can be assured of the quality and accountability. he takes his job very seriously and continuously gives his best, yet he is very down to earth and candid.
You can trust my judgement on this, I'm a manager in IT firm by profession, it's my job to observe people ;-)
reply_text: you are surely one of the sweetest patients i have too ritesh. thanks so much for the kind words. will keep your faith.

If you have any dental issue, I would definitely recommend Dr. Shetty and you can be sure u r in good hands. ****** *** *** ********* ********* *** ******* ****** ***********.

review: Dr. Jeevan Shetty has a well-equipped dental clinic.  He is well experienced & very professional in his work.  Well kept appointments.  He is very particular about the hygiene levels of his clinic including using face masks, hand-gloves, sterile equipment, etc.  As far as my dental procedure goes, he did an excellent job.  He worked with utmost care & precision & with a personalized touch which resulted in excellent final results.  The crowns which he fitted on me after the root canal procedure were so perfect in terms of shape, size & color that they blended so well with my natural teeth.  He suggested emax crowns which are very natural looking.  Overall it was a great experience.  Dr. Jeevan Shetty as well as his staff are well-mannered & soft spoken.  I give a 100 on 100 for Dr. Jeevan Shetty & his Dental Clinic.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for the appreciation. Keeps us going!

review:
I am writing this feed back as a researcher. 

Practice makes the things perfect. In my opinion Dr. Shetty have a hands-on experience on the problems and gained complete proficiency in addressing the problems. I have visited 32 Smile stones to know about an unexpected issue of an Addressed Problem. The problem is pain behind one of the teeth, which got treated for a root canal problem, three years back. While the earlier Doctor has address the issue, but planted a stone for new problem, Cavity between the New Cap and existing teeth (behind the treated one).

While I was expecting that the teeth might have lost, Dr. Shetty has nicely addressed the problem, not only by addressing the Cavity problem (a physics based solution) but also rectified the previous problem by modifying the CAP (an engineering problem).
reply_text: THANK you sir for looking at it that way. feels nice to be of help.

review:
Thank you for your kind treatment. I really appreciate the way you explain the details of the procedure which reduce the anxiety and make the whole thing easy. 
The clinic staff are also very co-operative and friendly.
In these COVID times the hygiene in your clinic is definitely good.
reply_text: Thanks for the encouragement.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I don't say this with pride but I have been to quite a few dentists and have got 6 root canals done so far. This was my best experience so far, he calmly explained the entire process which was almost painless. He was meticulous at each stage, I got a cap that fit perfectly and looked almost impossible to differentiate. He gave me a lot of tips to avoid decay. Would certainly recommend him.
reply_text: Thanks Sir/ma'am.. for these encouraging words. God bless.

review:
Dr. Jeevan Shetty & Dr. Mahesh Sonar has treated my mother's wisdom teeth. At the age of 77 she had lot of pain due to infection in the teeth. The reason of pain was correctly detected by Dr. Shetty & then along with Dr. Sonar the surgery for the removal of the teeth was performed precisely without any pain & that proves their expertise. 

My high regards & respect to both the Doctors. Thank you very much. 
Yogesh kadam

review: Doctor gave me pain reliever for wisdom tooth pain and has not taken any X-ray which could depict the direction of the tooth If it was correct. And the pain was increasing everyday.
reply_text: If the patient has severe pain, and the mouth opening is less, we don't usually trouble the patient by taking an x ray on the first sitting. I am sure you would have been called in for a subsequent appointment.  Our patient's well being is our primary concern, but we are very sorry if you felt otherwise.
